nodes.text: The S/min-12a hyperdrive was a model of hyperdrive developed by Sienar-Jaemus Fleet Systems for the First Order. Its design was stolen by Resistance technicians to create a miniaturized hyperdrive that could be mounted on their transports. General Leia Organa's transport used this kind of hyperdrive to reach Takodana and D'Qar during the war against the First Order.
